Desc.entry: A network which brings together parents and carers from across Sheffield to share their views and be part of decision making with regard to Sheffield City Council's services for children, young people and their families. Each quarterly assembly will focus on a specific topic. All parents and carers are welcome, however please contact before attending as places are limited.

ContactName.entry: Rebecca Mason, Parental Engagement Manager/John Featherstone

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Quarterly assembly meetings at various venues and times, please contact for details
